remarks: Transitivity of implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
subtr.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
subtr.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
subtr.3 $e |- F/_ x Y $.
subtr.4 $e |- F/_ x Z $.
subtr.5 $e |- ( x = A -> X = Y ) $.
subtr.6 $e |- ( x = B -> X = Z ) $.
subtr $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A = B -> Y = Z ) ) $.
